import { useEffect } from "react" import { deleteStudentFromDatabase } from "./services/studentServices" import { useState } from "react" import { fetchUserWorksheets, postStudentWorksheetToDatabase } from './services/worksheetServices' export const TestViewStudent = ({ user, chosenStudent, viewStudentToggle, setViewStudentToggle, editStudentToggle, setEditStudentToggle, handleFetchCalls }) => { const [worksheets, setWorksheets] = useState([]) const handleAssignStudentWorksheets = (event) => { const value = event.target.value const object = { userId: user.id, studentId: chosenStudent.id, worksheetId: value } postStudentWorksheetToDatabase(object) } const handleWorksheetFetchCalls = () => { fetchUserWorksheets(user.id).then((data) => { setWorksheets(data) }) } const handleViewStudentToggle = () => { setViewStudentToggle(!viewStudentToggle) } const handleDeleteButton = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const copy = { ...chosenStudent } deleteStudentFromDatabase(copy.id).then(() => { handleViewStudentToggle() handleFetchCalls() }) } const handleEditStudentToggle = (event) => { event.preventDefault() setViewStudentToggle(!viewStudentToggle) setEditStudentToggle(!editStudentToggle) } useEffect(() => { handleWorksheetFetchCalls() }, [user.id]) return ( <> {viewStudentToggle ?

First Name?

{chosenStudent?.studentCode}{chosenStudent.id}
